ygData.subject: Reinforcements/Enemy Reinforcements
ygData.msgSnippet: (I ve only now started paying attention to the battle at the CF so correct me if I m wrong with any of this) The Oblitercons/The Protectobots/Demon Wulf/Flesh

Subject: Reinforcements/Enemy Reinforcements
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0

From: KSLawdogg@...

(I've only now started paying attention to the battle at the CF so correct me 
if I'm wrong with any of this)


The Oblitercons/The Protectobots/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Imprisoner/
Predator/Choran/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot:



Two brothers watched with a look of children in a candy store in their blood 
red optic sensors, while the third's sensors detected the battle and he had 
the same feeling.  The battle was interesting.  Many different groups.  Many 
enemies.  But there in all their glory, were their ex-comrades, the Alliance. 
 Once again helping the Maximals. 

"My brethren," Demon Wulf growled, "if the Oblitercons form no doubt this 
battle will end."

"We should attack them specifically."

"Shall we focus on a single enemy, brothers?" Flesh Ripper asked in delight.

"No, but focus on the Oblitercons." 

With that, Demon Wulf raised his blade, launching a missile off at the 
airbound Dark One.

Dark Claw armed his missile launchers, a missile from each streaking out at 
Pyro's armored mode.

Flesh Ripper transformed to his hyena mode, scrambling off towards Scavenger 
at his top speed in the animal mode.

---

Dark One's sensors detected an incoming missile.  But he was a little 
flummoxed at the incoming object.  It was being fired by Demon Wulf, and as 
far as he knew Demon Wulf was in the Alliance.

Pulling up hard the was able to move out of the way of the missile, the shock 
wave from the explosion shaking him.  He was just lucky that wasn't a seeker 
or he'd be stuck into the earth below him.

Activating a secure comm. link with Zardus, he talked in still a confused 
tone.  "Zardus, Demon Wulf and his minions are opening fire on my team.  
Orders?" the mercenary team leader asked.  He wasn't going to open fire, but 
he doubted his team was going to follow his example.

---


Pyro felt two missiles strike his armored form but kept silent despite the 
pain.  "Slaggers." Swerving his cannon, he fired off a single fire ball at 
Dark Claw.

Breakdown looked at a dent where the missiles had hit.  "I'm getting out of 
this death trap." he said, opening the hatch and hopping out of the tank.

---

Scavenger saw a four legged animal coming at him and wasn't sure what the 
hell it was.  "Oh, the little puppy is going to get me." 

Hiss laughed at this comment, bringing his fusion cannon to bear on the 
incoming animal and fired a blast.  He face twisted to a face of complete 
surprise as the animal transformed into Flesh Ripper and was flying through 
the air straight at him.

Flesh Ripper swiped both arms downward, his claws digging into Hiss' chest, 
the full force of the Vok creation slamming Hiss hard into his seat.

Scavenger swerved as a Vok foot kicked his steering wheel at an angle, 
sending him swerving to the left a little.  "Watch it you dolts!"

---

"That damn base." Imprisoner said angrily as he got a visual on the 
Cybertronian Fire.  "We'll destroy that before we leave." Arming his twin 
missile launchers he launched a total of four missiles at the CF.

Predator and Choran piled out of Imprisoner's vehicle mode.

---

Nemesis Enforcer flew overhead, smiling at the battle.  Raising his 
automatic-laser rifle, he fired off twenty rapid laser blasts down at Rampage.

---

Scattershot raised his automatic rifle, firing off twenty armor-piercing 
rounds at "Megaton" while laughing hysterically.

----

The Protectobots poured out of the Cybertronian Fire a little confused.  The 
Alliance attacks the Maximals, the Alliance aids the Maximals.  A never 
ending cycle that made figuring out who their enemies were hard.

Hot Spot looked at the Predacons (Decepticons) with a burning sense of 
recognition that he couldn't place his "finger" on.  Raising his cannon he 
launched off three fire balls at Divebomb.

---

Groove raised his photon pistol, firing off two bolts at Megaton's torso.

---

Blades transformed to his AH-46 Apache attack-helicopter mode, lifting off 
into the air and arming his M230 30mm cannons.  He launched ten 
highly-explosive rounds from both cannons, twenty of that type of bullets 
heading for Razorclaw's torso.

---

First Aid stayed back from the battle for two reasons.  First, he was a 
medic, not a warrior.  Second of all, he was poorly armed, as he'd learned 
the hardway thanks to two near-death experiences.

---

Streetwise raised his heavy-laser rifle, a better choice than a photon 
pistol.  He fired a mighty blast from the weapon at Tantrum, charging the 
Decepticon Predacon.
